title: Giro d’Italia Stage 18: Nico Denz Bullies Breakaway Rivals with 17km Attack, Race for Pink Hits Pause
content:
German powerhouse uses brain and brawn to deliver solo raid for Red Bull-Bora-Hansgrohe, no changes on GC as Del Toro and Co. cruise through transitional stage.
